resources.string:
"Welcome!

The dictionary needs to be downloaded first.
Please make sure your device is connected to the Internet.
About 7 MB will be downloaded.

Do you want to start the download now?"
Thank you for your patience.\nYou can now start using the application!
Cannot download the dictionary.\nPlease make sure your device is connected to the Internet and try again.
The dictionary was not properly downloaded.\nPlease try again.
